text: 19.12 1 Ko 7.32-34, 9.5, 9.15 Nɨgɨm. Bɨ ogɨnap kɨli bin ma dɨpal okok, anɨgɨl mɨdeb agak. Ogɨnap nonɨm tɨkup ñɨn ak, mubwak kɨli kɨles ma mɨdeb ak ñapay ma tɨkɨnɨgabal tek lup ak nɨm, bin ma dɨpal agak. Ogɨnap bɨ okok wak kɨlop tɨbɨlɨkek, bɨ anɨb okok kɨli ñapay ma tɨkɨnɨgabal tek lup ak nɨm, bin ma dɨpal agak. Pen ogɨnap God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab wog ak gun agɨl, bin ma dɨpal agak. Pen bɨ takaw anɨb ak nɨgɨnɨg gɨnɨgel tek lup okok, nɨg dɨnɨgel agak.
